homepage.title: Discover Egypt
homepage.subtitle: Where history comes alive and adventures begin

popularDestination.title: Popular Destination
popularDestination.description: Discover essential insights to guide your adventure across the timeless land of PEACE, where history, culture, and breathtaking beauty meet.

tourPackages.title: Featured Tour Packages
tourPackages.description: Discover curated tour packages designed to help you explore Egypt's iconic landmarks, hidden gems, and unforgettable cultural experiences with ease and comfort.
tourPackages.noToursMessage: We're currently updating our tour packages. Check back soon for exciting new adventures, or reach out to us for custom tour options!

reasonsToVisit.title: Top Reasons To Visit Egypt
reasonsToVisit.subtitle: Discover what makes Egypt an unforgettable destination for travelers worldwide

reasons.title: Timeless Ancient History
reasons.description: Walk among 5,000-year-old pyramids, temples, and tombs that tell stories of pharaohs and ancient civilizations.

reasons.title: World-Class Diving
reasons.description: Explore vibrant coral reefs and marine life in the crystal-clear waters of the Red Sea, ranked among the world's best dive sites.

reasons.title: Warm Hospitality
reasons.description: Experience genuine Egyptian kindness and welcoming culture that makes every visitor feel like family.

reasons.title: Year-Round Sunshine
reasons.description: Enjoy over 300 days of sunshine annually with pleasant weather perfect for exploring any time of year.

reasons.title: Affordable Experiences
reasons.description: Discover luxury and adventure at incredible value, with world-class experiences that won't break the bank.

reasons.title: Delicious Cuisine
reasons.description: Savor authentic Egyptian flavors from koshari and falafel to fresh seafood and traditional sweets that delight every palate.

reviewsSection.title: Traveler Reviews
reviewsSection.description: Real experiences shared by travelers who explored the wonders of Egypt — stories that bring each destination to life with authentic insights and memorable moments.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.description: We provide exceptional travel experiences through trusted service, professional guidance, and tailored journeys designed to make your exploration of Egypt smooth, memorable, and truly unique.

features.title: Trusted Service
features.description: 100% secure bookings with verified guides and accommodations for your peace of mind.

features.title: Expert Guides
features.description: Licensed Egyptologists and local experts bring history to life with fascinating stories.

features.title: Custom Itineraries
features.description: Personalized tours tailored to your interests, pace, and travel style.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Round-the-clock assistance ensuring you're never alone on your journey.

features.title: Best Value
features.description: Premium experiences at competitive prices with no hidden fees or surprises.

features.title: Memorable Moments
features.description: We create unforgettable experiences that go beyond typical tourist attractions.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.paragraph: Explore a curated collection of stunning moments captured across Egypt — showcasing its rich heritage, vibrant culture, and unforgettable landscapes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your journey to the land of PEACE

0.question: What is E-Tour Guide?
0.answer: E-Tour Guide is your comprehensive digital companion for exploring Egypt's wonders. We provide virtual tours, interactive maps, historical information, booking services, and personalized itineraries to make your Egyptian adventure seamless and unforgettable.

1.question: How does the E-Tour Guide platform work?
1.answer: Simply create an account, browse our extensive collection of tours and destinations, and book experiences directly through our platform. Access audio guides and real-time information during your visit.

0.question: What types of tours does E-Tour Guide offer?
0.answer: We offer virtual tours, self-guided audio tours, private guided experiences, group tours, Nile cruises, desert safaris, cultural experiences, and customized itineraries. From the Pyramids of Giza to hidden gems in Aswan, we cover all of Egypt's treasures.

0.question: Can I access E-Tour Guide on my mobile device?
0.answer: Yes! Our website is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. Access all features directly through your mobile browser. We're also developing a Progressive Web App (PWA) for an even better mobile experience in the future.

1.question: Do I need to download anything to use E-Tour Guide?
1.answer: No downloads required! Simply visit our website from any device with a browser. In the future, our PWA will allow you to add E-Tour Guide to your home screen for quick access, even with limited internet connectivity.

2.question: Can I save tours for offline viewing?
2.answer: Currently, you need an internet connection to browse tours and access content. However, you can bookmark pages and save tour details. Our upcoming PWA feature will enable offline access to downloaded tours and guides.

0.question: Is creating an account free?
0.answer: Yes! Creating an E-Tour Guide account is completely free. Enjoy benefits like saved itineraries, booking history, personalized recommendations, exclusive deals, and loyalty rewards.

0.question: Which Egyptian cities do you cover?
0.answer: We cover all major tourist destinations including Cairo, Giza, Luxor, Aswan, Alexandria, Hurghada, Sharm El-Sheikh, Dahab, and the Western Desert oases. We're constantly adding new destinations and hidden gems.

1.question: What's the best time to visit Egypt?
1.answer: October to April offers pleasant weather (20-25°C) and is ideal for sightseeing. Summer is hot but less crowded with better prices. Red Sea resorts are great year-round.

2.question: Can I visit lesser-known destinations?
2.answer: Absolutely! Beyond famous sites, we offer tours to Siwa Oasis, White Desert, Fayoum, Abydos, Dendera and many hidden treasures.

0.question: Do I need a visa to visit Egypt?
0.answer: Most nationalities can obtain a visa on arrival for $25 USD. E-visas are also available online. Some require advance arrangements.

1.question: What currency is used in Egypt?
1.answer: The Egyptian Pound (EGP). USD and EUR are widely accepted in tourist areas. ATMs are common. Keep small bills for tips.

beforeAfter.subtitle: Compare & Contrast
beforeAfter.description: See what changes when you travel with us

before.title: Overwhelmed by planning
before.text: Spending hours researching attractions, transportation, and best times to visit

after.title: Pre-planned itineraries
after.text: Detailed day-by-day guides with optimal routes and timing for each destination

before.title: Missing key information
before.text: Arriving at sites without context or historical background

after.title: Rich audio commentary
after.text: Professional narration at every stop revealing fascinating stories and secrets

before.title: Getting lost easily
before.text: Struggling with confusing maps and language barriers in unfamiliar places

after.title: GPS navigation built-in
after.text: Turn-by-turn directions that work offline, guiding you seamlessly between locations

before.title: Expensive tour guides
before.text: Paying $100+ per day for group tours with fixed schedules

after.title: Affordable freedom
after.text: One-time purchase gives you a personal guide in your pocket, explore at your pace
